snippet: The book is adapted from a regular column Ms. Winfrey writes for her magazine. It set for release in September.
abstract: Oprah Winfrey's latest book What I Know for Sure, adapted from her regular column in O magazine, features her insights about life's struggles and inspirations; is set for release in September 2014.
lead_paragraph: The book is adapted from a regular column Ms. Winfrey writes for her magazine. It set for release in September.

headline.main: New Book From Oprah Winfrey Is ‘What I Know for Sure’
